customCatalogUtil.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    getCatalogValues: function () {
        var answer ='';
        var sysID = this.getParameter('sysparm_sysID');
        var grItem = new GlideRecord('sc_cat_item');
        grItem.addQuery('sys_id', sysID);
        grItem.addEncodedQuery('sc_catalogsLIKE4c27c139db9210105bc027374896196e');
		grItem.query();
        if (grItem.next()) {
            answer = true;
        }
        return answer;
    },

    type: 'customCatalogUtil'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-09-21 15:22:52</sys_created_on><sys_id>8cb85a07dbdf10105bc0273748961996</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>customCatalogUtil</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_8cb85a07dbdf10105bc0273748961996</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-09-21 15:33:23</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
